caption.p: Differential expression analysis of survivors compared to non-survivors at the time of diagnosis (day 0). Gene expression profile of patients with melioidosis that survived after 28 days ( n = 14) compared to patients that did not survive ( n = 15). Color indicates statistically significant genes (adjusted P value ≤ 0.05, correction method = Benjamini-Hochberg), dark blue: down-regulated genes ≥ 2 fold change, dark red: up-regulated genes ≥ 2 fold change with grey corresponding to genes showing no expression change.
